card.name: The Axiomata
card.text: At the beginning of each endstep gain X life where X is the amount of spells you have cast this turn, If X is three or greater draw a card.

card.name: The Vidalian
card.text: Spells you cast cost 1 less to cast 1: 3 Create a 0/0 shapeshifter token, It enters with X +1/+1 counters on it where X is the total mana of other spells you have cast this turn.

card.name: Clothed in Power
card.text: Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) At the beginning of your upkeep make a copy of enchanted creature except it has vanishing 2

card.name: Mind's Desire
card.text: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Time Bomb
card.text: Return a creature you control to its owner’s hand, then destroy all creatures.

card.name: Surge of BrillianceSurge of BrillianceSurge of BrillianceSurge of BrillianceSurge of Brilliance
card.text: Paradox — Draw a card for each spell you’ve cast this turn from anywhere other than your hand. Foretell 1U (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
